msbt.message: After today, is over. It really went by in a flash.Last chance to try to make good on my New Year's resolutions, I guess. Better late than never, !
Will you be at the plaza for the Countdown? I hope so!I'm going to do my best to stay up so I can greet the new year, but I may need some coffee to do it
The plaza's been buzzing with preparations for New Year's Eve! I'm sure it's going to be a ball. , I can't help getting swept up in all of it!
Since this is the last day of , I've been looking back at my past year's worth of diary entries. There was that time Oh, and the other one So many fun memories And I'm glad you were part of them.
